description.lang: TP-LINK Smart Home Router is an all-in-one router and Internet of Things (IoT).It can work as the central intelligence hub for devices throughout the home, enabling consumers to control their devices and automate functions tailored to their preferences.Key Features:Connect your smart home devices and have them work together to enhance your quality of lifeFour Gigabit Ethernet Ports for lightning-fast wired connectionsAdvanced security encryption to protect dataSupports 802.11ac and backwards-compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n
